This is a problem for Sun 1.5 VMs as well.
Can the test be disabled when testing with 1.5 for 3.2?

Clown nose partially goes to me...there was a bug in the Ant test infrastucture.
Reading in the files to create the documents was stripping off the trailing line separators after all non-whitespace content. This resulted in why I could not reproduce the bug in the wild with the test buildfile.

Fixed in AbstractAntUITest. 
With this change, required a tweak to the formatTest_target03.xml as well.

Now the real bug. On Xerces (1.3, 1.5, IBM) we get column information. On Crimson we do not (1.4). Therefore within the Ant code we have two paths during parsing / creation of the Ant model depending on whether there is column info or not. With column info has been less tested.
Fixed in AntModel and modified the buildtest2.xml to catch this problem.
